channel.title: Abcscape - Help!

item.title: Abcscape - Help!
item.dc:creator: @Abcscape Abcscape
item.description:
@Abcscape wrote:

[center][size=13pt]Welcome[/size][/center]

I’m looking for alot of help at the moment. I’ve added a command that adds reputation to another player.

[center]if (command.startsWith("Rep")) { String Victim = command.substring(4); int Pi = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client P = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Pi]; P.sendMessage("You have gained 1 reputation point."); P.sendMessage("You now have "+Reputation+" reputation points."); sendMessage("You sent "+Victim+" 1 reputation point."); Rep(Victim); }[/center]

The command works but it takes to long for it to kick in. I use the command, then it disconnects me. I use the command again, then it disconnects me. I use the command and it kicks in. I need to know why it does this.

Read full topic
